item.title: O
item.description: score:107 Chances: Realty Income (O) has a focus on leasing to service, non-discretionary, and low price-based retailers, which bodes well for the company. The steady rise in the monthly dividend is encouraging and indicates a consistent level of cash flow from operations. The company is offering exchange offers for notes, which shows strategic financial planning and flexibility.
